title: BCHD Node Development
summary: BCHD is a full node and blockchain server written in Go. The immediate goals of this project is to first and foremost support application development as a high performance blockchain server.
description: The immediate goals of this project is to first and foremost support application development as a high performance blockchain server. This will include adding an SLP index to support the burgeoning token sector. Secondly we want BCHD to become a fully capable mining node to help support mining diversity in Bitcoin Cash.
